original_text: When thou goest forth to war against thine enemies, and the Lord thy God hath delivered them into thine hands, and thou hast taken them captive,
korean_text: 네가 나가서 적군과 싸울 때에 네 하나님 여호와께서 그들을 네 손에 넘기시므로 네가 그들을 사로잡은 후에

sentences.original_text: When thou goest forth to war against thine enemies,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 원수들과 싸우러 나아갈 때에,

sentences.original_text: and the Lord thy God hath delivered them into thine hands,
sentences.korean_translation: 네 주 하나님이 그들을 네 손에 붙이시고,

sentences.original_text: and thou hast taken them captive,
